block.p: From the boot of Italy to a trip down the Nile to the glaciers far north, Fashions of The Times goes to 17 countries -- including Mali, Brazil, China, Cuba, South Korea, India and Wales -- to show women's clothes for fall. Part 2 of The Times Magazine.
Plus: Modern pirates travel on speedboats, not galleons. They steal jet fuel and aluminum, not doubloons. But they are still willing to kill for booty. A report by Jack Hitt in The Times Magazine.
